alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 13 at 4:57AM CDT until August 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected along the Lake Superior shoreline due to high wave action and strong rip currents. * WHERE...Minnesota Park Point and Wisconsin Point Beaches. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...High wave action can make swimming difficult on days such as this. Incoming waves in rapid succession can tire even an experienced swimmer quickly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Waves early this morning have been observed to be between 1 to 2 feet. Wave heights will increase through the day, reaching a peak of up to 4 feet this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
